summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 1 and 2, Holbrook & Clark's Addition, being the alley between California Avenue and 44th Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Oregon Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13982 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
